item.title: Do not remove instance when packer build fails
item.description: I want to run commands manually inside the instance built by packer for investigation when packer build fails. Packer remove the instance by default when the build fails. We can change the behavior by -on-error=abort option. $ AWS_ACCESS_KEY=*** AWS_SECRET_KEY=*** packer build -on-error=abort app.json Then you can ssh to the instance after packer build exited with error. ssh into EC2 instance built by packer This time I use AMI Builder (EBS backed) as builder.
